imdb.plot outline: A weekly entertainment news program, hosted by Andrew Caravella, the program highlights the past week's biggest Hollywood headlines. The show features veteran sports journalist "The Schmo" who spotlights sports stars with in-depth interviews from around the US. Jessica Ross, the show's celebrity correspondent, gets up close and personal with celebrities on the red carpet at various premieres and events.
imdb.title: Backstage Weekly
